TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontFamily extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Spreadsheet.InternationalPropertyType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is x:family.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **family (Font Family)** The font family this font belongs to. A font family is a set of fonts having common stroke width and serif characteristics. This is system level font information. The font name overrides when there are conflicting values. Value Font Family *0* Not applicable. *1* Roman *2* Swiss *3* Modern *4* Script *5* Decorative |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |font (§18.8.22); rPr (§18.4.7)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Value)|The value of an integer, where each value corresponds to a different character set. This attribute is restricted to values ranging from 0 to 255.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *int* datatype.| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_IntProperty) is located in §A.2. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FontFamily class.

Docs.param: true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; false to clone only the node itself.
